messages.title: How we can change the future together

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.health: UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service.
issues.immigration: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.

housing.content: UKIP will SCRAP the bedroom tax.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Voter, Living in London means many things to many different people. However, we all agree that for the people of London, as with the people of Britain, to see the best from our Country, we all need to have control over our lives, our society and our laws. I joined UKIP to achieve these goals. I vote UKIP so to place decision making back in the hands of the people of Britain. Only local people can make the right decisions locally, tackling local issues. As your MP I will place your needs first, giving you that voice.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by John Hellings on behalf of Andrew Beadle, Suite 407, 29 Walworth Road, London SE17 1RL. Printed by Media Print Hub, Park Lane House, Park Lane, Oldbury B69 4JX.

images.caption: Andrew Beadle in Bermondsey & Old Southwark Standing Up for Real Change
